data.comment: The match is underway. Huddersfield have kicked-off.
Josh Koroma puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at John Smith's Stadium.
It's Bristol City with the kick-off after the break.
Famara Diedhiou is replacing Tommy Rowe for the away team.
In the minute 68, The away team have replaced Nahki Wells with Antoine Semenyo. This is the second substitution made today by Dean Holden.
Bristol City make their third substitution with Jamie Paterson replacing Chris Brunt.
Naby Sarr is booked for the home team.
In the minute 75, Carel Eiting is on a sub for Josh Koroma for Huddersfield.
Ben Hamer for Huddersfield has been booked by Peter Bankes and receives a first yellow card.
Jay DaSilva gets an equalizer for Bristol City. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Isaac Mbenza with Adama Diakhaby.
Goal! Jamie Paterson gives Bristol City a 1-2 lead.
Carlos Corberan is making the team's third substitution at John Smith's Stadium with Matty Daly replacing Christopher Schindler.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Jonathan Hogg (Huddersfield) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
